Font Mfizz - Vector Icons for Technology and Software Geeks

Font Mfizz provides scalable vector icons representing programming languages, operating systems, software engineering, and technology. It was designed as an extension to Font Awesome, it is an iconic font designed for technology and software geeks. It can instantly be customized â€” size, color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done with the power of CSS.

For full documentation and packages to download (rather than use master), visit http://mfizz.com/oss/font-mfizz

Designed by Mfizz Inc, Joe Lauer.

Updates tweeted @mfizz_inc
